## SingletonProvider class

A provider for singleton class instances

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SingletonProvider<T> extends ClassProvider<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_instance](./injector.singletonprovider._instance.md) |  | <code>T &#124; undefined</code> |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [provide(injector)](./injector.singletonprovider.provide.md) |  |  |

## Remarks

The `SingletonProvidr` caches the first instance of a class it creates and subsequently returns the cached instance instead of creating new instances.
